definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 进劳教所时，抽血化验查出李的血液中携带艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on HIV/AIDS-related knowledge, attitude, and performance (KAP) in Jianghua Yao Autonomous County.
sentences.chinese: 目的对江华县开展艾滋病防治健康教育进行效果评价。

sentences.english: At present, the world's more than a day of the new HIV infections last.
sentences.chinese: 目前，世界上每天有万余人新感染上艾滋病病毒。

sentences.english: HIV stands for human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病病毒是指人体免疫缺损病毒。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 这种新型的口服抗艾滋病毒药物属于整合酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: Many scientists think, the virus which causes AIDS did jump from the African Green Monkey.
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家认为，导致艾滋病的病毒来自非洲的青猴。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the AIDS prevention knowledge among middle-school students in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解农村中学生预防艾滋病知识水平。

sentences.english: Government requested to monitor into the pre-marital HIV testing project.
sentences.chinese: 政府要求将艾滋病监测纳入婚前检测项目。

sentences.english: I am suffering from AIDS because of drug abuse, and imprisonment because of drug-related crime.
sentences.chinese: 我因为吸毒患上艾滋病，也因为涉毒犯罪入狱。

sentences.english: AIDS prevention and treatment organizations need long-term and sustained funding.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病的预防和治疗组织需要长期且持续的资金保障。

sentences.english: Let us use it to end AIDS – once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 让我们借此势头，去消灭艾滋病，将它斩草除根。

sentences.english: This database presents and links to English-language information about HIV/AIDS-related statutes from countries in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 本数据库主要提供亚洲各国与艾滋病有关的法律法规。

sentences.english: Objective To promote the intervention for preventing the mother-to-infant transmission of HIV among HIV infected pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 目的促进艾滋病感染孕产妇母婴阻断干预措施的实施。

sentences.english: This suggested that potentially they may be an ideal therapeutic agent for the treatment of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 预示松塔提取物可能成为艾滋病的理想治疗剂。

sentences.english: AIDS has been an epidemic for years now across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病成为全球性流行性疾病已经很多年了。

sentences.english: US blood banks are screened for the virus
sentences.chinese: 美国血站开始筛查艾滋病毒。

definition: AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
